channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: TikTok reportedly developing new version of app ahead of planned US sale
item.description: TikTok is developing a new version of its app for U.S. users ahead of an expected sale of the app to a group of investors, according to a new report f...

item.title: On Mexico’s Caribbean Coast, There’s Lobster for the Tourists and Microplastics for Everyone Else
item.description: The fishermen of Puerto Morelos complain of pirates who fish off-season with total impunity, while their small catches are contaminated by the abundan...

item.title: 13 Best Wi-Fi Routers of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Don’t suffer the buffer. These WIRED-tested systems will deliver reliable internet across your home, whatever your needs or budget.

item.title: Ingram Micro says ongoing outage caused by ransomware attack
item.description: Ingram Micro is one of the largest distributors of tech and cloud products.

item.title: People Are Using AI Chatbots to Guide Their Psychedelic Trips
item.description: As psychedelic companies and therapy apps experiment with AI, people are already taking huge doses of drugs and using chatbots to process their trips.

item.title: Apple appeals EU’s €500M fine over App Store payment restraints
item.description: Apple has filed appealed the EU's decision to fine the company €500 million (about $580 million) for not complying with competition rules.

item.title: Thanks to Zillow, Your Friends Know How Much Your House Costs—or if You’re Secretly Rich
item.description: A quick search of your friends’ addresses can yield one of the most private details of their financial lives. Some people say their wealthy acquaintan...

item.title: ‘Improved’ Grok criticizes Democrats and Hollywood’s ‘Jewish executives’
item.description: On Friday morning, Elon Musk declared, “We have improved @Grok significantly. You should notice a difference when you ask Grok questions.”

item.title: Best Indoor TV Antenna (2025): Mohu, Clearstream, One for All
item.description: Plug into free HD TV with these convenient and affordable indoor antennas.

item.title: At least 36 new tech unicorns were minted in 2025 so far
item.description: With AI igniting an investor frenzy, every month, more startups obtain unicorn status. Using data from Crunchbase and PitchBook, TechCrunch tracked do...
